text: If you grew up in Diamond bar back in the day .. really good pies.. now it has changed to many hands thru the years...they... now.. pizza is not a priority...big TVs and over priced beer .. warm by the way..if you decide to go there look at â€¦More

name: Pinal SelfStorage
text: Nice location so you can shop while pizza baking. Kids made great pizza. Fair prices, fast service & clean.

name: Linda Lockwood
text:
Just not my favorite taste in Pizza. Good location serving Diamond Bar area. Free delivery.
Hiring...good for a student!

text: This place taste worse than other locations, plus when I called them, their attitude was so bad, really want to give 0 star

name: lin lum
text: Good taste american pizza I like vegetable pizza they cook it well

text: This place is horrible.   Took over 1 hr to deliver,  incomplete order,  no confirmation from web site about the order,  inconsistent product,  had to call in twice to check on order,  ORDER FROM ANOTHER LOCATION

name: Martin Morris
text: Ordered several times from them great pizza.

text: Good pizza and i love the garlic sauce

text: I ordered it online but it is not ready when I went to pickup half an hour later online information said it will be ready in 25 minutes
